overview:
David Brozik is the Development Manager at Socialbakers where he is responsible for all software development processes and he is also the Project Director of the Socialbakers main product AnalyticsPRO.

Prior to Socialbakers, David was gaining experiences in the field of software development on various positions in different companies like Panasonic or Pilsner Urquell. Besides software development David worked in Marketing & Sales department for a small company that builds custom software for their customers where he was responsible for developing marketing strategies for gaining new orders.
